item.title: This is how you get a clean git history
item.description: Communication is a core pillar when it comes to working as a team. Without good communication it is almost impossible for a team to achieve great things. As developers, we are lucky to have many tools helping us to become great communicators and good team players. One of those tools are git. It’s infamous for being counter-intuitive and easy to screw up. It’s quite fitting that Oh Shit, Git!?! has helped many developers in dire need of git guidance.
